title: Orange/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Orange "Orange")**

 • [한국어](/wiki/Orange/ko "Orange/ko")

 • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| % [![Orange.png](/images/4/43/Orange.png)](/wiki/File:Orange.png) |                                                                                                        |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| 名称                                                                | 橙子                                                                                                     |
| 基础价                                                               | 9 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                  |
| 营养值                                                               | [80](/index.php?title=%E8%90%A5%E5%85%BB%E5%80%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "营养值 (page does not exist)") |
| 食用所需回合数                                                           | 1                                                                                                      |
| 重量                                                                | [2](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")            |
| 行为                                                                | [绝对素食](/index.php?title=%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "行为 (page does not exist)")         |

**橙子**（orange）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[素食](/index.php?title=%E7%B4%A0%E9%A3%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "素食 (page does not exist)")类[可食用品](/wiki/%E5%8F%AF%E9%A3%9F%E7%94%A8%E5%93%81 "可食用品")。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [4 Variants](#Variants)

  - [4.1 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [4.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [4.3 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [4.4 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)

- [5 百科文本](#.E7.99.BE.E7.A7.91.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得5～10个橙子[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时获得的随机食物中有可能出现橙子[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

用脚[踢](/index.php?title=%E8%B8%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "踢 (page does not exist)")[树](/index.php?title=%E6%A0%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "树 (page does not exist)")有14⁄15的概率生成(8-[rnl](/index.php?title=Rnl/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Rnl/zh-CN (page does not exist)")(7))个橙子，每棵树限一次[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。砍倒一棵树有1⁄5的概率掉落一个水果，其有可能是橙子[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。如果树木被[掘洞怪物](/index.php?title=%E6%8E%98%E6%B4%9E%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "掘洞怪物 (page does not exist)")破坏，它有1⁄3的概率生成一个随机水果，其有可能是橙子[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

[使用](/index.php?title=%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "使用 (page does not exist)")有[充能](/index.php?title=%E5%85%85%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "充能 (page does not exist)")的[丰饶之角](/index.php?title=%E4%B8%B0%E9%A5%B6%E4%B9%8B%E8%A7%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "丰饶之角 (page does not exist)")有0.9%的概率生成1～2个橙子[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。

## 描述

[食用](/wiki/%E9%A3%9F%E7%94%A8 "食用")一个橙子能够获得80营养值。橙子适合于[绝对素食](/index.php?title=%E7%BB%9D%E5%AF%B9%E7%B4%A0%E9%A3%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "绝对素食 (page does not exist)")行为，也可以用于驯服[草食类](/index.php?title=%E8%8D%89%E9%A3%9F%E7%B1%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "草食类 (page does not exist)")的[家畜](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%B6%E7%95%9C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "家畜 (page does not exist)")[怪物](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物 (page does not exist)")。

如果玩家在[幻觉](/index.php?title=%E5%B9%BB%E8%A7%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "幻觉 (page does not exist)")状态下食用[拟形怪](/index.php?title=%E6%8B%9F%E5%BD%A2%E6%80%AA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "拟形怪 (page does not exist)")的[尸体](/wiki/%E5%B0%B8%E4%BD%93 "尸体")，其会短暂地伪装成橙子的模样。若在[金库](/index.php?title=%E9%87%91%E5%BA%93\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "金库 (page does not exist)")内伪装为橙子的样子时被金库的[警卫](/index.php?title=%E8%AD%A6%E5%8D%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "警卫 (page does not exist)")发现，他会发出“是谁在金库里留下一个橙子”的疑问。

## 历史

橙子最初在[Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack")的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11里出现，在[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")中是首批加入游戏的物品之一。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Orange/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), the Pacman [random vault](/wiki/Random_vault_\(UnNetHack\) "Random vault (UnNetHack)") has a guaranteed orange at a random position.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), [Bards](/wiki/Bard "Bard") start each game with 3-6 oranges; [incantifier](/wiki/Incantifier "Incantifier") Bards and Monks have their oranges replaced with scrolls of [food detection](/wiki/Scroll_of_food_detection "Scroll of food detection"). [Clockwork automata](/wiki/Clockwork_Automaton_\(starting_race\) "Clockwork Automaton (starting race)") characters in roles that would start with oranges replace them with potions of [oil](/wiki/Potion_of_oil "Potion of oil").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), the last floor of the [Ice Queen's Realm](/wiki/Ice_Queen%27s_Realm "Ice Queen's Realm") has 3 oranges in the lower-right [crystal chest](/wiki/Crystal_chest "Crystal chest") within the central room of the castle.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), Bards start each game with 3-6 oranges as in dNetHack, and incantifier Bards and Monks receive scrolls of food detection instead.

## 百科文本

橙子和[梨](/wiki/%E6%A2%A8 "梨")的百科文本相同。

What was the fruit like? Unfortunately, no one can describe a taste. All I can say is that, compared with those fruits, the freshest grapefruit you've ever eaten was dull, and the juiciest orange was dry, and the most melting pear was hard and woody, and the sweetest wild strawberry was sour. And there were no seeds or stones, and no wasps. If you had once eaten that fruit, all the nicest things in this world would taste like medicines after it. But I can't describe it. You can't find out what it is like unless you can get to that country and taste it for yourself.

\[ The Last Battle, by C.S. Lewis ]

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 93](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L93)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 144](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L144)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/dokick.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1115](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dokick.c#L1115)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/dig.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 398](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dig.c#L398)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/dig.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1321](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dig.c#L1321)
6. [↑](#cite_ref-6) [src/mkobj.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 2219](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mkobj.c#L2219)

Orange/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Orange
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 한국어

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
%
名称 橙子
基础价 9 zm
营养值 80
食用所需回合数 1
重量 2
行为 绝对素食

橙子（orange）是NetHack中的一种素食类可食用品。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 历史
  • 4 Variants
    • 4.1 UnNetHack
    • 4.2 dNetHack
    • 4.3 EvilHack
    • 4.4 SlashTHEM
  • 5 百科文本
  • 6 引用及注释

生成

僧侣在游戏开始时会获得5～10个橙子[1]。游客在游戏开始时获得的随机食物中有可能出现橙子[2]。

用脚踢树有14⁄15的概率生成(8-rnl(7))个橙子，每棵树限一次[3]。砍倒一棵树有1⁄5的概率掉落一个水果，其有可能是橙子[4]。如果树木被掘洞怪物破坏，它有1⁄3的概率生成一个随机水果，其有可能是橙子[5]。

使用有充能的丰饶之角有0.9%的概率生成1～2个橙子[6]。

描述

食用一个橙子能够获得80营养值。橙子适合于绝对素食行为，也可以用于驯服草食类的家畜怪物。

如果玩家在幻觉状态下食用拟形怪的尸体，其会短暂地伪装成橙子的模样。若在金库内伪装为橙子的样子时被金库的警卫发现，他会发出“是谁在金库里留下一个橙子”的疑问。

历史

橙子最初在Jay Fenlason's Hack的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11里出现，在Hack 1.0中是首批加入游戏的物品之一。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, the Pacman random vault has a guaranteed orange at a random position.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, Bards start each game with 3-6 oranges; incantifier Bards and Monks have their oranges replaced with scrolls of food detection. Clockwork automata characters in roles that would start with oranges replace them with potions of oil.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, the last floor of the Ice Queen's Realm has 3 oranges in the lower-right crystal chest within the central room of the castle.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, Bards start each game with 3-6 oranges as in dNetHack, and incantifier Bards and Monks receive scrolls of food detection instead.

百科文本

橙子和梨的百科文本相同。

What was the fruit like? Unfortunately, no one can describe a taste. All I can say is that, compared with those fruits, the freshest grapefruit you've ever eaten was dull, and the juiciest orange was dry, and the most melting pear was hard and woody, and the sweetest wild strawberry was sour. And there were no seeds or stones, and no wasps. If you had once eaten that fruit, all the nicest things in this world would taste like medicines after it. But I can't describe it. You can't find out what it is like unless you can get to that country and taste it for yourself.

[ The Last Battle, by C.S. Lewis ]

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 93
  2. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 144
  3. ↑ src/dokick.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1115
  4. ↑ src/dig.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 398
  5. ↑ src/dig.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1321
  6. ↑ src/mkobj.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 2219

'''橙子'''（orange）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[素食]]类[[可食用品]]。

== 生成 ==
[[僧侣]]在游戏开始时会获得5{{波浪线}}10个橙子{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|93|nethack=3.6.7}}。[[游客]]在游戏开始时获得的随机食物中有可能出现橙子{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|144|nethack=3.6.7}}。

用脚[[踢]][[树]]有{{frac|14|15}}的概率生成(8-{{cnlink|rnl}}(7))个橙子，每棵树限一次{{refsrc|src/dokick.c|1115|nethack=3.6.7}}。砍倒一棵树有{{frac|5}}的概率掉落一个水果，其有可能是橙子{{refsrc|src/dig.c|398|nethack=3.6.7}}。如果树木被[[掘洞怪物]]破坏，它有{{frac|3}}的概率生成一个随机水果，其有可能是橙子{{refsrc|src/dig.c|1321|nethack=3.6.7}}。

[[使用]]有[[充能]]的[[丰饶之角]]有0.9%的概率生成1{{波浪线}}2个橙子{{refsrc|src/mkobj.c|2219|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 描述 ==
[[食用]]一个橙子能够获得80营养值。橙子适合于[[绝对素食]]行为，也可以用于驯服[[草食类]]的[[家畜]][[怪物]]。

如果玩家在[[幻觉]]状态下食用[[拟形怪]]的[[尸体]]，其会短暂地伪装成橙子的模样。若在[[金库]]内伪装为橙子的样子时被金库的[[警卫]]发现，他会发出“是谁在金库里留下一个橙子”的疑问。

== 历史 ==
橙子最初在[[Jay Fenlason's Hack]]的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11里出现，在[[Hack 1.0]]中是首批加入游戏的物品之一。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===UnNetHack===
In [[UnNetHack]], the Pacman [[Random vault (UnNetHack)|random vault]] has a guaranteed orange at a random position.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], [[Bard]]s start each game with 3-6 oranges; [[incantifier]] Bards and Monks have their oranges replaced with scrolls of {{? of|food detection}}. [[Clockwork Automaton (starting race)|Clockwork automata]] characters in roles that would start with oranges replace them with potions of {{! of|oil}}.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], the last floor of the [[Ice Queen's Realm]] has 3 oranges in the lower-right [[crystal chest]] within the central room of the castle.

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], Bards start each game with 3-6 oranges as in dNetHack, and incantifier Bards and Monks receive scrolls of food detection instead.

== 百科文本 ==
橙子和[[梨]]的百科文本相同。

{{encyclopedia|
What was the fruit like?  Unfortunately, no one can describe a taste.  All I can say is that, compared with those fruits, the freshest grapefruit you've ever eaten was dull, and the juiciest orange was dry, and the most melting pear was hard and woody, and the sweetest wild strawberry was sour.  And there were no seeds or stones, and no wasps.  If you had once eaten that fruit, all the nicest things in this world would taste like medicines after it.  But I can't describe it.  You can't find out what it is like unless you can get to that country and taste it for yourself.
|[ The Last Battle, by C.S. Lewis ]
}}
